t: Origin Glass Co.
s: February 12, 2024 - Origin Glass Co. started off on Amazon as a different brand. Their name was confusing, sales were sluggish, and PPC spend was sky high with low traffic and conversion rates. Though their product quality was excellent, they didn’t have the bandwidth or knowledge to see consistent growth on Amazon.
